description:
Furusawa is a muscular giant. He lives with his motorcycle in his room, which means that when he wants to ride it, he has to carry it down (and later up) the stairs. This often leads to him putting his foot through the floor.
Furusawa was the Dorm Head the year Mitsuru and Shinobu were first years.
He has a girlfriend, Kawasumiya Yuuko, for whom he works part time.
name: Furusawa Shin`ichirou
